actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Transportation to publish a notice of proposed rulemaking concerning seat belts on school buses, and for other purposes.
short_title: Secure Every Child Under the Right Equipment Standards Act of 2018

summary.text:
Secure Every Child Under the Right Equipment Standards Act of 2018 or the SECURES Act of 2018

This bill directs the Department of Transportation to publish a notice of proposed rulemaking on new federal standards for school bus seat belt requirements on all school buses, regardless of gross vehicle weight rating.
